dialogues.text: Big fat baby good.., you fat... Fat and juicy! Lynn is paralyzed with fear. Lizard imitates a mother cradling her baby.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Baby... Baby... Instinctively, Lynn grabs the closest thing, a FRYING PAN and hits Lizard brutally in the face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stunned, he falls to the ground and drops the baby, who begins to wail. when he lifts his head, Lynn strikes again- He blocks her arm and twists it, bringing her to her knee Lynn tries to fight him off, but he is too strong. Still restrained, Brenda spots the PHILLIPS SCREWDRIVER u the sleeper. The one Bobby had used to fix the A/C. At the other end of the trailer, Lizard has immobilized L and POINTS THE GUN AT THE BABY! Lynn stops.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No...No...Please... Please don't... Without a word, Lizard tears off Lynn's shirt and bra. The gun stays pointed at the baby as- Lizard removes Ethel's sun hat and hovers over Lynn's breast... Seen from behind her shoulder, we can't figure out exactl what this mental case is doing... Is he nursing from her breast? Lynn trembles, but can only think of her baby and her sis who are still threatened. Excited by what his brother is doing, Pluto fondles Brend Suddenly, Ethel jumps into the trailer with a broom and starts batting away at Lizard. For once, her adrenaline kicks in as she fights for the m important thing in her life - Her family. The broom has little effect and is almost comical... BANG! - Lizard shoots Ethel in her chest, throwing her ba

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From far away, Bobby hears the gunshot. He quickly turns around to help his family.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the trailer home, Brenda takes advantage of the confus to get away from Pluto and grabs the Phillips screwdriver from beneath the sleeper. Brenda slides the screwdriver to Lynn who raises it and i about to strike when- BANG! - Lynn is shot in the chest. Lizard turns to Brenda and aims at her head. He is about to shoot when Lynn, with her last breath-

dialogues.speaker: TEARING THROUGH HIS FLESH
dialogues.text: Lizard screams in pain and turns the gun back to Lynn- BANG! - He blows off part of her skull. Blood splatters throughout the cabin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alarmed by the gunfire, Doug gets up and looks at the tra in the distance. He doesn't know what to do. Bobby appears behind him-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on Doug! They're in the trailer-! They both take off running.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Witness to the slaughter, Brenda is petrified with fear. Lizard pulls out the screwdriver and stands with difficul He picks up the baby and hands it to Pluto.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take it. Pluto obeys. Lizard grabs Brenda by the hair and pulls he out of the trailer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on bitch... She screams and resists by grabbing at furniture and pull off the curtains... Her nails scratch against the paneling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Brenda is pulled out by Lizard. When he sees Bobby and Doug approaching, Lizard changes h

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Brenda is wide eyed. Without hesitating, Lizard pulls the

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLICK! - no more bullets. Lizard drops Brenda.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll come back for ya... Lizard disappears into the night. Brenda lays on the ground trembling and crying. Doug arrives at the trailer, while Bobby aims the 9mm at assassins.

dialogues.speaker: BANG
dialogues.text: It's too late. They're gone. Bobby runs to his traumatized sister laying on the ground holds her in his arms, trying to calm her down. Doug approaches the open door. He notices bloody hand pri along the side of the trailer home- One of the attackers been hurt...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doug enters the trailer unable to imagine the tragedy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Horrified, he discovers Ethel on the couch, not quite dea but short of breath and in pain. Doug is stone faced-

dialogues.speaker: ON THE GROUND, LYNN'S BODY, HIS OWN WIFE, SOAKS IN HER BL
dialogues.text: His eyes fill with tears. He tries to keep from crying bu his sadness is too deep. His hand approaches her face. His fingers graze her hair.

dialogues.speaker: CIRCUIT SHORTING OUT.
dialogues.text: Doug tries to breathe life back into her body, but death overtaken her open eyes. He closes them and starts weepin The music from the Fisher Price mobile is the only other sound... Doug turns around. THE CRIB IS EMPTY...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No...No... He squeezes his fist with rage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At the foot of the burnt tree, Big Bob's body is laid out some rocks, the blanket over his face. A few figures emerge out of the darkness and gather aroun the body like a pack of hyenas. BIG BOB IS DRAGGED AWAY THROUGH THE DUST...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Backlit by the moon, at the top of the hill, we find Gogg and his binoculars. Reflecting in the lenses, we see the carters' trailer glo in the night. A rustling noise attracts his attention.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Before Goggle can turn around, a wild animal jumps at his face- IT'S BEAST. The German shepherd tears at Goggle's face and locks deep into his throat. Goggle tries to fight it off, but the an is determined to kill. Goggle grabs AN OLD RAZOR out of his pocket and tries to the animal. The dog bites down tightening its grip. BONES CRACK. He drops the razor. Goggle's derby hat falls between some rocks.

dialogues.speaker: BEAST AVENGES BEAUTY IN A BLOODFEST
dialogues.text: Someone calls him on the on walkie-talkie-

dialogues.speaker: RADIO, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: "Goggle? Goggle..." Goggle will not answer anymore...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laid out on the couch, Ethel agonizes between life and de Brenda stares into space, saying nothing. Doug touches he head as he passes. Instinctively, she backs off terrified Across the trailer, Bobby paces back and forth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are we going to do Doug? What are we going to do if they come back? Completely defeated, Doug comes back and goes to Ethel's side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doug! Doug does not answer and takes Ethel's hand. She opens he eyes and looks at him as if nothing happened.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This camper's so small. No matter how much you clean, it's always a mess.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doug nods in silence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is Big Bob home?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not yet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did everyone go to bed?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, Brenda is here and Bobby is in the kitchen. At the other end, Bobby turns away, crying. Brenda looks as well.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (short of breath) Is Lynn sleeping? Doug holds back the tears.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes.. (after a beat) Do you need anything? Ethel finds it more and more difficult to talk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look in the closet Doug, I'm sure I have another blanket. I'm so cold. Doug tucks one of the blankets around her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's one here. Nice and warm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You've always been so sweet. I understand why Lynn loves you so much. She raises her arm to caress his face. Her hand falls on the bed. Lifeless. Brenda screams, bursting into tears.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At the same time Bobby pounds his fist against a wall. Hi eyes full of hate, he joins Doug.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on! I'm not going to take this shit... Doug gets mad as well.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fine. You stay here. I'm going after them. Doug gets between Bobby and the door, preventing the kid leaving.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let me go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You want to die, too?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't care. Doug drags him in front of his mother's body.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look! Look at what they did to your mother. Look at what they did to your sister. He slams Bobby against the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're not a fucking child, alright? Think before you do something stupid. You won't make it three feet! We need a plan, OK? We need to think...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Think about what? They have Catherine, Doug... Doug remains silent...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THEY HAVE CATHERINE... You know what they could to do to her, and you're not going to stop them?! You're just a coward... Doug jumps back on Bobby grabbing him by the collar.

dialogues.speaker: A MUFFLED SOUND COMES FROM OUTSIDE
dialogues.text: They all freeze. Doug releases Bobby and immediately turns off the light. Plunged in darkness, Brenda panics again-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.. No... don't turn it off!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He swore he'd come back to get me. He swore it. Don't let him take me, Bobby! Outside, another noise, AND A SHADOW PASSES BACKLIT BY TH

dialogues.speaker: WANT TO DIE...DO SOMETHING...
dialogues.text: Bobby picks up the gun- BANG! BANG! BANG! - With no hesitation, he shoots through door. Brenda throws herself into Doug's arms. Bobby stares at the bullet holes in the trailer door. Suddenly, the sound of a radio is heard-

dialogues.speaker: RADIO, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: "Goggle, you copy? Goggle..." Bobby and Doug look at each other confused.
/ГЏВїВЅ 85 CONTINUED: (4) 85

dialogues.speaker: RADIO, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: "Goggle?" Doug silently moves closer to the door. From outside we can see Doug's eye through one of the bul holes. Nobody, everything seems quiet. DOUG

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get ready Bobby.. Doug opens the door and jumps out ready to fight. From beneath the trailer, someone observes him... Doug bends down and discovers- GOGGLE'S SEVERED ARM. In its hand, the walkie-talkie stil works.

dialogues.speaker: RADIO, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: "Goggle? Goggle?" Doug grabs the radio. It's dripping with blood. Bobby is about to join him when Doug signals- THERE'S SOMEONE HIDING UNDER THE TRAILER. Without a sound, Bobby aims the gun at the kitchen floor. Outside, Doug backs up to see who is hiding. Behind the step ladder, he sees an inert shape in the shadows. BANG! - Bobby shoots through the floor. Immediately, the shadowy figure jumps out into the light- DOUG

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Beast! The dog jumps into Doug's arms and begins licking his fac Bobby can't believe it, his dog has returned. Radio static comes back on the walkie. Bobby picks it up-

dialogues.speaker: RADIO, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: "Papa Jupe... Goggle is dead. I found him in the rocks..." "Dead?" (MORE) (CONTINUED)
85 CONTINUED: (5) 85

dialogues.speaker: RADIO, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: "They got him. He's all torn up..." Bobby is proud of Beast. Still in the trailer, Brenda loo at them, not as hopeful. BOBBY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good boy.. That's a good dog.

dialogues.speaker: PAPA DUPE/RADIO, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: "I'm gonna take care of those bastards myself"... Bobby exchanges a worried glance with Doug. Even though neither of the two has yet met Papa Jupe, something in hi voice tells them that it's only going to get worse. Doug grabs the radio- DOUG

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in the radio)

dialogues.speaker: YOU DOING THIS TO US
dialogues.text: No answer. Just static. DOUG (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: ANSWER ME
dialogues.text: (IN DESPERATION)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Give me back my little girl... Give her back to me... More static... DOUG (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: DO YOU HEAR ME
dialogues.text: Silence. Suddenly we hear-

dialogues.speaker: CATHERINE'S CRIES ON THE RADIO
dialogues.text: Doug drops the radio, scared speechless... DOUG (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How much ammo do you have left? BOBBY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know, half a clip? CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: INT. DARK PLACE
dialogues.text: On a dimly lit wooden table, Catherine lays, wrapped in a blanket. A butcher's knife is planted next to her... Asthmatic breathing, and the sound of running water punct the silence. Ruby steps out of the darkness and moves towards the baby She watches through her abnormally large eyes and extends stringy fingers to touch the baby. A large screen splits the room in two. A strangely shaped shadow moves behind the screen: A HANDICAPPED BODY washed by A LARGE WOMAN... An empty wheel chair rests in a corner. Amused, Ruby looks at the baby who smiles back. She caref takes Catherine in her arms when the invalid's voice INTERRUPTS-

dialogues.speaker: LARGE WOMAN, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Put that down Ruby... You know better than to play with your food... Ruby takes a step back, hugging the baby tighter. - RUBY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mama, pleaaase...

dialogues.speaker: HANDICAPPED, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: (weak asthmatic voice) Listen to your mother Ruby and put that baby down... Now! Frightened, Ruby obeys and quickly runs out of the room. The baby starts crying... CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Brenda sits by the C/B and retries the SOS calls. (CONTINUED)
87 CONTINUED: 87 BRENDA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mayday... Mayday... We need help ..Mayday... Mayday... can anybody hear me? Something has gone off in her eyes. She is absent, no lon living, just surviving. Doug is about to leave, taking with him anything from the trailer which might be useful. BASEBALL BAT, FLASHLIGHT, PHILLIPS SCREWDRIVER... BOBBY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let me go with you. DOUG

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, you stay here with your sister and stay by the radio. Somebody's bound to hear us. Brenda continues her distress call. BRENDA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mayday...mayday... Can anybody hear me? DOUG (TO BOBBY)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sun'll be up soon. One of them is hurt, I'm going to follow his trail through the hills. Bobby pulls out the 9mm gun and hands it to him. DOUG (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. You keep it in case they come back. BOBBY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about you? DOUG

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't worry about me, I'll take Beast. Beast sits at his feet ready to go. Doug straps the walki talkie over his shoulder. BOBBY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doug? (CONTINUED)
87 CONTINUED: (2) 87 DOUG

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes? BOBBY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I... I didn't mean what I said... Doug hugs him like a brother. Before walking out, he bends down to Lynn's body and kiss her one last time on the mouth. DOUG

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm going to find.our baby my love...I promise. CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The first sign of dawn lights the distant horizon. The vultures perched on a dead Joshua Tree swivel their h around, to see a distant, running FIGURE - DOUG AND BEAST, moving steadily among the rocks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doug and Beast arrive at the old mine's entrance on the s of the hill. The trail of blood leads inside. Doug hides behind a rock. Sweating, he catches his breath Beast breathes heavily as well. Doug remembers what his w always used to say- DOUG

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to the dog) I told you to stop smoking. Doug sets a different frequency on his radio- DOUG (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Into the walkie) Bobby? Bobby? You read me?

dialogues.speaker: BOBBY, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Yeah, Doug... DOUG

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I followed the blood, I'm in front of a mine! (MORE) (CONTINUED)
89 CONTINUED: 89 DOUG (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not sure if I'll get a signal from inside. If you don't hear from me in a half an hour, you're on your own. (A BEAT)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bobby? BOBBY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah... Good luck, Doug. He puts the walkie away and takes out the flashlight. DOUG (TO BEAST)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You ready big guy? I hope you're not afraid of the dark. He pets the dog one final time and stands up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With the light from the entrance behind him, shadow enter the mine. The beam from his flashlight follows the trail of blood o the ground. The wooden pylons which have held up the walls for a hund years threaten to crumble at any second. Only static on the radio. Doug turns it off. He moves further into the darkness, probing with his flashlight into the inky pit. Doug arrives at a fork splitting the tunnel off in two different directions. Doug lights each tunnel with the flashlight until he find the one with-the blood trail, then continues on into that one. Tracking. Suddenly he stops. The beam of the flashlight has revealed TWO DOZEN PICKAXE that have been planted in the ground over mounds. That lo very much like graves. The pickaxes look eerily like cros given the whole place the feel of A SUBTERRANEAN GRAVEYAR Hanging from the graves, dates and portraits of all the miners who have died here, including women and children.. The flashlight dims. Doug taps it to no avail. (CONTINUED)
90 CONTINUED: 90 DOUG

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on. You can't be serious. Then light goes. completely off, leaving Doug in darkness Scratch! - He lights a match. Holding the tiny flame, Doug continues down the tunnel un he arrives at another fork. He can no longer see the bloo trail.

dialogues.speaker: A SHAPE SLIDES SWIFTLY BEHIND HIM
dialogues.text: DOUG (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Beast, meaning HIMSELF)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just stay calm, boy... A gust of air kills the match. He immediately lights another- Again, THE DRAFT SNUFFS IT OUT. He turns around, looking for the source of the air, and notices a reflection of light at the end of the tunnel. He moves towards the reflection.

dialogues.speaker: EST. MINE EXIT
dialogues.text: On the other side of the hill, the collapsed wooden beams stones block part of the mine's exit. Doug emerges with Beast. His eyes takes a moment to adapt the bright sunlight. He. cannot believe what he sees. At the bottom of a hill,

dialogues.speaker: 50'S.
dialogues.text: Doug turns the walkie on. DOUG (ENTHUSIASTIC)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: .Bobby, Bobby, it's Doug... I can't believe it! I found a street and some houses. Maybe somebody does live here... The radio remains silent. (CONTINUED)
91 CONTINUED: 91 DOUG (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bobby, do you hear me? Bobby? Still nothing. Doug turns around and looks up- A wall of rock towers behind him. He tries one last time, but the signal won't go through.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Close up on the C/B radio in the trailer- Only static comes from the speakers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Brenda drags one of the tires from the SUV 30 feet away. She douses it with lighter fluid and- Whoosh! - a match sets it on fire creating a thick, black smoke signal. Brenda joins her brother who is busy planting wooden stak in a circle fifty meters around the trailer. BRENDA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe somebody heard our calls.. BOBBY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nobody's going to find us Brenda, even with that smoke...Nobody's coming._.. You heard what Doug said-We're alone now, just you and me. Let them come, I'm waiting for them. Now, Bobby stretches the nylon wire from the fishing pole around each stake. He sets the fishing pole next to the trailer, rigging to it one of Catherine's TOY SHAKERS- An improvised alarm system.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At the summit, somebody observes the trailer and the thic cloud of smoke rising to the air. CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doug runs down the hills towards the town. Behind him, fr the mouth of the mine, someone observes between the rocks it's Ruby. Doug slows his pace as he enters Main Street. The town is deserted. No sign of life anywhere. All the houses and ca are covered with a thick layer of dust. Taking a closer look, he realizes all the parked cars are from the 50's. Uncertain, Doug walks through the ghost town, with Beast his side... No movement besides the wind blowing and lifting an occasional cloud of dust. Doug walks up to a house and kn on the front door. No one to open the door. Doug wipes one of the windows- It's too dark inside to see anything. The door is unlocke Doug pushes it. It squeaks open. He hesitates before entering.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sunlight passes through the dusty windows revealing a living/dining room decorated from the 50's. Doug can't believe his eyes- Through the kitchen door, he can see a woman doing dishes A man sits in the living room reading a newspaper. Children play in front of the blank TV set...

dialogues.speaker: THESE ARE NOT REAL PEOPLE BUT MANNEQUINS
dialogues.text: They have been dressed and placed into real life situatio

dialogues.speaker: THE ATOMIC SYMBOL CAN BE FOUND ON EACH OF THEIR FOREHEADS
dialogues.text: Doug spots a telephone behind the staircase and checks fo dial tone. Nothing. He picks up the phone casing. EMPTY. JUST LIKE EVERYTHING ELSE IN THE HOUSE, IT'S FARE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doug quickly crosses Main Street to visit another house.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: New interior- New surreal setting. Around a table, a family of test dummies eat dinner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stupefied, Doug enters yet another house. The door remains open as we see another family of dummies living a perfect little life. A LIFE WHICH STOPPED IN THE LATE 50'S... Around the corner of a house, a little girl dummy is sitt on a swing, her face half broken. A second later, Doug thinks he hears CHILDREN LAUGHING. H TURNS AROUND-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing but the wind blowing through the houses. Doug takes Catherine's bib from his pocket and lets Beast its scent. DOUG

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Find her, Beast, find Catherine... With his nose to the ground, the dog pulls Doug straight ahead. Doug walks away through the streets, pulled by the dog. On the outskirts of town, we discover a fence buried in t sand. On it, an old metallic sign reads-

dialogues.speaker: TEST SITE 3B
dialogues.text: The scent leads Doug into an alley off the main street. He sees an old generator on full throttle. A thick smoke pours from the exhaust.

dialogues.speaker: SOMEONE LIVES HERE
dialogues.text: His daughter could be there... (CONTINUED)
99 CONTINUED: 99

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doug tries to see into the windows, but they are caked in filth. He decides to go around when-

dialogues.speaker: A MAN WALKS INTO VIEW WITHOUT SEEING HIM
dialogues.text: Immediately, Doug backs away. The man drags a cadaver by its feet. Half of the dead bod is missing, having apparently been torn off. Beast GROWLS. The man turns around, revealing his horrible face- A METALLIC BRACE is screwed on four sides of his head hel him stand straight. ENORMOUS CYSTS DISFIGURE HIM AND COVE EVERY VISIBLE PART OF HIS BODY. Let's call him "CYST". Cyst traces back his steps, trying to find what caused th noise. He holds the gas station attendant's shotgun! The alley is empty. The generators are still motoring. All seems normal. Cyst turns back towards main street. Cyst passes an old'parked car without seeing Doug and the hidden inside. Doug breathes a sigh of relief. Close call. Quietly, Doug gets out of the car. He hesitates as to whe he should bring Beast with him or to leave him in the car The dog could be his best weapon but, on the other hand, also represents a_bigger risk to be spotted. DOUG (CONT'D) (SOFTLY)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You wait here Beast! Come on, sit!... Good boy. I'm gonna find Catherine... The dog is confused and whines through the half-opened window. DOUG (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shhhh... Quiet Beast... Don't move! I'll be back... He closes the car door and starts down the alley, lowerin his head. (CONTINUED)
99 CONTINUED: (2) 99

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From inside the car, Beast watches Doug getting further away... Doug sneaks along the side of the building towards the fr door. He hesitates, unsure of what awaits him inside-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doug crosses a doorway without making a sound. He enters front hall squeezing the bat in his hands. Something in the air, A DISGUSTING SMELL, catches his attention. Doug moves slowly and discovers, in the dining room, sitting amongst the dummies-

dialogues.speaker: BIG BOB'S CHARRED BODY
dialogues.text: His father-in-law's arms have been torn off and devoured. AMERICAN FLAG that used to adorn his SUV is planted THROU

dialogues.speaker: HIS FOREHEAD
dialogues.text: Doug approaches terrified.

dialogues.speaker: BEHIND HIM A WEAK AND ASTHMATIC VOICE BEGINS TO SING THE
dialogues.text: NATIONAL ANTHEM-

dialogues.speaker: VOICE, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: "Oh, say can you see, by the dawn's early light, What so proudly we hailed at the twilight's last gleaming?" Doug jumps and quickly lifts the baseball bat, ready to swing. Nobody. Just the fake living room filled with inert dummi No trace of his baby. An electrical fan turns in a corner close to a shelve full of old books... Doug moves forward, gripping the bat tightly.

dialogues.speaker: VOICE, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: (feeble and asthmatic) "...Whose broad stripes and bright stars, through the perilous fight..." He can hear his own heart beat as he searches through the house. In another room, close to the window and in the shadows, he sees someone sitting in a wheelchair. (CONTINUED)
102 CONTINUED: 102

dialogues.speaker: VOICE, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: "...And the rockets' red glare, the bombs bursting in air..." Doug gets closer- A ray of light shines on the skull of whoever sits in the wheel chair. The wheel chair moves forward revealing a most horrific s BIG BRAIN - We recognize the handicapped man whom we have seen before, bathing behind the screen. Big Brain's body skeletal. He was born with a genetic disease giving him a head ten times bigger than his face. A head so heavy, he unable to hold it up. It rests back on his chair, forcing to stretch his eyes to see from side to side. Big Brain is maybe the most representative character of t damage done by nuclear fallout in this area. Doug threatens him with the baseball bat- DOUG

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's my baby! Where's Catherine?! Big Brain does not answer. DOUG (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What did you do with her? BIG BRAIN (MURMURING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ..Nothing.. Doug is beyond his breaking point - DOUG

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where is she then? ANSWER ME! He raises the bat. BIG BRAIN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (weak and asthmatic) .I don't know where she is. I never leave this place... Big Brain moves away from the window wheeling himself to couch. His hands are thin and pale, like a child's. (CONTINUED)
102 CONTINUED: (2) 102

dialogues.speaker: BIG BRAIN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: ..You should've read the signs before taking that road... DOUG

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What signs?! BIG BRAIN (SMILING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Boom. .. Boom... Boom DOUG

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell are you saying?! BIG BRAIN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (weak and asthmatic) You people settled on our lands, you destroyed our homes, destroyed our silver mines. . .You 'ye made us what we've become! One day my father went into town begging for your help, and you know what the doctors did? They sterilized him like a dog! You thought that in the desert no one would see anything, or say anything, but the hills... The hills never forget...

dialogues.speaker: BOOM...BOOM...B000M
dialogues.text: DOUG

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know what you're talking about. All I want is my daughter. Please... Big Brain remains silent. DOUG (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you want? Money? I can give you money... WHAT DO YOU WANT? BIG BRAIN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe a trailer? Yeah, a pretty trailer, just like yours. DOUG

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are the others? Where is my baby? Big brain starts laughing a high pitched sound. (CONTINUED)
102 CONTINUED: ( 3) 102 DOUG (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What? What's so funny? BIG BRAIN

dialogues.speaker: IT'S BREAKFAST TIME
dialogues.text: At the same moment-

dialogues.speaker: WITH AN AXE AND SMASHES INTO THE HOUSE
dialogues.text: Like a wild animal, Pluto charges Doug, destroying everyt in his path. Doug retreats in the living room, throwing the dummies at assailant. The giant comes closer and closer. Dummies are chopped into pieces. Doug dodges away and tries to escape, using the stairs in hallway but the giant grabs him by the feet and pulls him down... The axe swings through the air missing him by a hair each time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sensing his master is in trouble, Beast jumps around insi the car trying to find an exit... The passenger window opening is too small for him to brea out...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doug runs into another room, escaping from Pluto and his Instinctively, he uses the first piece of furniture he ca find, A CHEST, to block the door behind him. He looks desperately for an exit. No way out. The axe penetrates through the door. The chest won't be enough to hold back Pluto. Second axe blow- This time the axe tears up the boards of door, allowing Pluto to stick his gruesome face inside. Seeing Doug trapped in the room, the bald giant begins to laugh stupidly before turning around and walking away. (CONTINUED)
104 CONTINUED: 104

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The house is now silent. No sign of the giant. With his heart pounding through his chest and the basebal bat in hand, Doug moves towards the half-broken door,.

dialogues.speaker: DOUG
dialogues.text: Doug loses his bat but slides away before the axe comes swinging down. Desperate, he picks up the bat and uses it as a shield. T axe splits it in half. Doug throws himself at Pluto plunging the splintered bat his abdomen. The sharp piece of wood enters Pluto's stomach. Completely out of his mind, Pluto removes the piece of wo from his abdomen and beats Doug in the face with it, send him across the room. Pluto lowers his head, charging Doug like a bull. Doug crashes into one of the walls. He can't even take a breath before the giant grabs him by leg like a rag doll and throws him through a wall. Doug falls to the ground in the living room. Wounded and exhausted, he is also defenseless. He has lost his glasse Not far away, Big Brain savors the spectacle. The giant walks to him spinning the axe in his hand like baton. His foot crushes Doug's glasses on the floor. The axe swings through the air. Doug jumps out of the way ANOTHER SWING-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doug stares wide eyed at his amputated fingers and scream with pain. Blood is everywhere. In an act of self preservation, Doug crawls under the tab (CONTINUED)
104 CONTINUED: (2) 104

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pluto destroys it with the axe and advances to finish him off. His asymmetrical eyes stare coldly- Doug is at his mercy. Pluto slowly caresses the axe's blade on his victims thro and face. The sharp blade moves dangerously across Doug's skin. Plu stops when he sees Doug holding his PHILLIPS SCREWDRIVER! Pluto laughs like a dumb child at the feeble weapon. Behi him, Big Brain joins in on the laughter- Disfigured by his wounds, Doug is frozen with the screwdr pointed at the giant. He looks ridiculous and starts sobb like a terrorized child. DOUG

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please, I'm begging you... Don't kill me... PLUTO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (making fun of him) Loook at-t hiiis fa-ace... Loook at- at hiiis fa-ace... Even the frozen faces of the test dummies seem to mock hi SUDDENLY-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doug stops crying_instantly, it was a trick! He turns the screwdriver around and slams it into Pluto's foot. The screwdriver goes through the shoe nailing Pluto to th floor. Pluto screams in pain. Doug rises and moves behind him. In a swift movement, Dou takes the American flag from Big Bob's forehead, stabbing Pluto in the back of the neck!

dialogues.speaker: OLD GLORY'S STAFF COMES THROUGH HIS THROAT ON THE OTHER S
dialogues.text: Pluto screams again, dropping the axe. Outraged, Pluto tears the flag from his neck and turns to Doug. (CONTINUED)
104 CONTINUED: (3) 104 PLUTO STOPS-

dialogues.speaker: DOUG IS HOLDING THE AXE.
dialogues.text: The blade swings through the air and slams into Pluto's skull! Pluto's eyes freeze and his body falls to the ground, his skull half open. DOUG JUMPS ON TOP OF HIM. FULL OF RAGE, MUTILATES PLUTO WITH THE AXE TO THE POINT OF EXHAUSTION. Big Brain watches Pluto die without showing any emotion. Silence returns to the destroyed house. Doug tears off a piece of Pluto's shirt and uses it as a BANDAGE for his hand... He picks up his half broken shattered glasses on the floo and put them back. SLING! - Doug removes the bloody axe from the corpse. He turns to Big Brain, who backs off- BIG BRAIN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The baby... the baby is in the last house on the left... CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The back door to the SUV opens, revealing Bobby and Brend carrying Lynn's body inside where Ethel's body has been moved. Not far from the car and above the fishing pole, Catherin shaker remains still and silent...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Still imprisoned in the car, Beast barks, desperate to fi way out. A hundred yards away- Cyst crosses Main Street toward Big Brain's house still holding the shotgun. Through the broken door, Cyst spots Pluto in a pool of bl Hatred fills his eyes as he loads the shotgun and prepare shoot. (CONTINUED)
106 CONTINUED: 106

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks for Doug but sees no one. Cyst moves in between a few cars, failing to see Doug hid behind one of them. Doug hits the man in his knee with the axe. HE SEVERS HALF OF HIS RIGHT LEG. Cyst screams in agony. In one swift move, Doug removes the axe from Cyst's kneec swinging it into his back. Cyst falls on the ground. The fall pushes the axe further into his back. Cyst reach for the shotgun lost in his fall. Doug steps on his chest and pushes slowly- Crack - The axe finally hits the spine, killing him instantly. Doug picks up the shotgun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From the broken window, Big Brain watches Doug walk away down Main Street. He picks up a walkie-talkie hidden in h WHEELCHAIR- BIG BRAIN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lizard... Kill the baby...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lizard enters the house holding a MACHETE. The wound Lynn given him before she died still bleeds through his improv bandage. He moves to the kitchen with a limp. There, he comes face face with Ruby. Behind her, the baby is wrapped inside a blanket on the table. The kitchen walls are covered with dry blood. Severed hum remains are scattered about and hanging like slabs of mea Ruby blocks his way- LIZARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get out of the way Ruby... (CONTINUED)
108 CONTINUED: 108

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ruby refuses to let him pass. Lizard lifts the machete threatening his little sister. LIZARD (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: I TOLD YOU TO MOVE. NOW MOVE
dialogues.text: Scared, Ruby obeys and runs out the kitchen door. Lizard approaches the baby, who moves inside the blanket.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At the same time, Doug arrives at the last house on the street. He looks for his baby in every part of the house. Nothing but dummies. Doug enters a room and sees a crib. DOUG

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Catherine?! He goes to the crib and discovers a plastic doll...

dialogues.speaker: BIG BRAIN LIED
dialogues.text: SMALL VOICE (INNOCENT)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You want to play with us mister? Doug turns around and sees two children playing in the shadows. They smile at him kindly-

dialogues.speaker: THEIR FACES AND LITTLE BODIES ARE MONSTROUSLY DEGENERATED
dialogues.text: Doug backs away terrified.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lizard is about to butcher the baby on the table. Catherine is calm and moves slowly under the blanket.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In a panic, Doug runs out of the last house screaming. DOUG

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lizard lifts the machete and removes the blanket-

dialogues.speaker: STATION
dialogues.text: Ruby made the swap before Lizard entered the kitchen. The piglet runs off oinking... LIZARD

dialogues.speaker: RUUUBY
dialogues.text: Enraged, Lizard sticks the machete into the table.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Outside, with the baby in her arms, Ruby runs as fast as can.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Desperate, Doug runs through the test town looking for hi daughter. In an upstairs window, he sees Ruby's mother, THE OBESE WOMAN, swinging on a rocking chair staring back. Suddenly, coming from the hills, Doug hears the sound of baby crying. In the distance, he spots Ruby running throu the rocks. He runs with the shotgun in hand. DOUG

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Catherine!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Under the fake car, in between the seats, Beast finds a h big enough to fit his nose. The animal forces his way through, scratching at the floo until he finally fits his body through the hole and out o the car. The dog runs down Main Street... CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Back on the trailer- (CONTINUED)
116 CONTINUED: 116

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sweating, Bobby joins his sister hidden behind the SW. Wi the 9mm in hand, staring at the horizon, he is ready to f the enemy. Above the fishing pole, Catherine's shaker is still. Gust of wind blow on the eerily silent plains. Suddenly, in a flash, the fishing line tightens and THE SHAKER MOVES AROUND, MAKING NOISE. Then, quiet returns as if nothing had ever happened. Brenda is terrified. Maybe someone has crossed their zone security. Bobby Lifts his head and looks a full 360Г‚В°- NOTHING. Bobby and Brenda exchange worried glances when-

dialogues.speaker: FRENETICALLY.
dialogues.text: The fishing reel quickly unwinds... This time there is little room for doubt, even if all see clear around the camper. BRENDA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't.see anybody... What's happening? Bobby and Brenda leave their hiding place. They move, bac back, cautious... BRENDA (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: answer me, why isn't anyone there? I'm scared... BOBBY (LOW VOICE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stay close Brenda. From inside the SW, we see the two adolescents getting further away when-

dialogues.speaker: WINDOW
dialogues.text: (CONTINUED)
116 CONTINUED: (2) 116

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's PAPA JUPITER. His long hair and thick beard cover everything except his determined and PSYCHOPATHIC EYES. Bobby and Brenda have arrived at the end of their securit zone... BRENDA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look! Further ahead, on the ground, a tumbleweed is stuck on th fishing wire, moving it in the wind. BRENDA (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's go back... Not convinced, Bobby agrees, but his face freezes when he turns back to see- THE BACK DOOR OF THE SUV, WIDE OPEN. At a loss, Bobby and Brenda return.

dialogues.speaker: THEIR MOTHER'S BODY HAS BEEN REMOVED
dialogues.text: BRENDA (CONT'D) (PANICKED)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What happened? What happened Bobby? Where's mom? A trail of blood leads from the trailer to somewhere behi some rocks. BOBBY (TO BRENDA)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's over there. Get the trailer ready.._ The new "visitor" has brought the nightmare back to life Brenda's eyes. She's paralyzed. BOBBY (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Brenda? Come on? Brenda remains still. BOBBY (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: BRENDA
dialogues.text: Terrorized, Brenda backs up to the trailer, while her brother, with a determined look on his face, walks to the hills.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Brenda returns to the trailer where two propane tanks hav been brought out from under the sink. Through the window, she watches her brother get further o

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What Bobby discovers behind the rocks is beyond horrific- Kneeling next to his mother's corpse, Papa Jupiter devour her heart, tearing into it with his teeth. FEELING BOBBY'

dialogues.speaker: SADISTIC SMILE. BLOOD DRIPS DOWN HIS BEARD.
dialogues.text: Bobby points his gun at him. Papa Jupiter stands and, in a fit of rage, charges at Bob Keeping his cool, Bobby fires- BANG! BANG! BANG! The bullets only slow him down. CLICK! The gun is empty.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Brenda opens the valves to the gas tanks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: .Outside, Bobby throws the gun and runs to the trailer as as he can. _ Papa Jupiter is right behind him. He takes a SMALL PICKAXE from his belt and throws it at Bobby.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bobby enters the trailer, closing the door behind him. He quickly tapes matches at the bottom of the door, right ab the striking part of the matchbox on the floor. Next to him, the propane flows freely.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Behind the trailer, Brenda helps her brother squeeze out the back window. They both run and hide behind a rock. At the same time, Papa Jupiter stands in front of the tra door, relishing the idea that his victims are inside. He opens the door. The matches strike- PAPA JUPITER IS ENGULFED IN THE FLAMES.

dialogues.speaker: THE TRAILER HOME EXPLODES
dialogues.text: Protected by the rocks, Bobby and Brenda watch as the explosion climbs to the sky. They did it... CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With Catherine held tightly in her arms, Ruby runs on the edge of the mountain. Seventy yards behind, Lizard gives chase with a limp and chain of spikes in tow. LIZARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ruby...Ruby! You come back here right now. You hear me, you little bitch? The road on the edge comes to a dead end. Ruby is stuck, the only way out is to climb. Without usin her hands, she attempts to ascend. It's close to impossib

dialogues.speaker: SUDDENLY, LIZARD GRABS HER ANKLE
dialogues.text: She tries to fight him off, but he is too strong. Ruby kicks him in the jaw enraging him more. He pulls her down swiftly when-

dialogues.speaker: BEAST APPEARS BEHIND RUBY
dialogues.text: The animal shows his teeth, advancing towards Lizard who backs off. (CONTINUED)
127 CONTINUED: 127

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lizard is amused and almost excited with this last confrontation... Discreetly, he grabs the chain of spikes while keeping his eyes on the barking German Shepherd.

dialogues.speaker: THE RUSTY, RETRACTABLE SPIKES ARE RELEASED ALONG THE CHAI
dialogues.text: Beast sees the weapon and leaps towards Lizard. Too late. The chain strikes the dog in the air, sending h over the edge.

dialogues.speaker: RAVINE A FEW FEET FURTHER DOWN...
dialogues.text: Ruby refuses to hand over the baby, holding it tightly to chest. LIZARD (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Give me that baby, Ruby! With no time to react, Lizard is brutally struck in the f with the shotgun butt-

dialogues.speaker: DOUG IS BACK
dialogues.text: Taking no chances and screaming like a wild beast, Doug b Lizard repeatedly pushing him away from the baby. With a bloodied face, Lizard can hardly stand. Doug turns the weapon around and- BANG! - He shoots Lizard in the chest. Lizard is thrown back with the force. Doug reloads still screaming- BANG! Lizard is hit in the throat and falls.to his knees. Blood sprays everywhere. Doug reloads again- BANG! - hit in the shoulder, Lizard falls back in the dir His face slams into the dust. Exhausted, Doug walks over to his adversary. He is dead. Disfigured with wounds, Doug turns to Ruby, who extends t baby. (CONTINUED)     127 CONTINUED: (2)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doug can barely comprehend it - the nightmare is finally over! He. drops the smoking gun and opens his arms to embrace h baby. He cries tears of joy as he holds Catherine close t him. DOUG

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My baby ...My little princess... It's me, it's daddy... He kisses the baby and hugs her tightly, elated. Ruby is moved. She smiles when suddenly her face freezes-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Trembling, he lifts the weapon towards Doug and the baby. Instinctively, Ruby moves to stop him. KA-CHUNK! - Lizard reloads. His finger squeezes the trigger.

dialogues.speaker: BANG
dialogues.text: At the last second, Ruby jumps on Lizard changing the direction of the blast. They both fall off the mountain into the emptiness. Their bodies plunge a hundred feet down, splattering on the roc below.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One of the FAMILY PHOTOS of the carters posing with their dogs is slowly burning away in the flames. Pieces of the trailer still burn in the middle of the des Surrounded by debris, Papa Jupiter's body is impaled.on a darkened metal siding. Still alive but entirely burnt, hi skin is raw and unrecognizable. With every breath, blood spits from his mouth... Facing this post atomic creature, Bobby hesitates to take out of its misery. Brenda comes to his side- (CONTINUED)
130 CONTINUED: 130 BRENDA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, Bobby. Let's get out of here... Bobby's face has changed. He is no longer the innocent ki just a few hours ago. His eyes are now filled with rage a determination to survive and succeed no matter what. Brenda and Bobby walk away from the burning trailer. On t other side of the smoke, they see-

dialogues.speaker: DOUG WALKING BACK WITH THE BABY, BEAST LIMPING AT HIS SID
dialogues.text: Exhausted, wounded, disfigured, but still alive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From a distance, next to the fiery trailer, we see Doug, Brenda, and Bobby gathered around the baby. Reunited agai

dialogues.speaker: BINOCULARS.
dialogues.text: THE END
